languages.text: "Да сохранит Азуриан детей своих... Мы должны остановить неистовство твоего звездного соперника, элантах! Иначе, клянусь слезами Иши, его подданным не избежать возмездия!"

traits.locale_text: "Да сохранит Азуриан детей своих... Мы должны остановить неистовство твоего звездного соперника, элантах! Иначе, клянусь слезами Иши, его подданным не избежать возмездия!"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"
languages.original_text: "Да сохранит Азуриан детей своих... Мы должны остановить неистовство твоего звездного соперника, элантах! Иначе, клянусь слезами Иши, его подданным не избежать возмездия!"

traits.speaker: Player

traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"

traits.locale_text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"

traits.locale_text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Qu'Asuryan protège ses enfants... Nous devons calmer les ardeurs meurtrières de votre rival des étoiles, elantach ! Sans quoi, je jure sur les larmes d'Isha que ses sujets en répondront ! »
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'Asuryan protège ses enfants... Nous devons calmer les ardeurs meurtrières de votre rival des étoiles, elantach ! Sans quoi, je jure sur les larmes d'Isha que ses sujets en répondront ! »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “愿阿苏焉保佑他的孩子们……我们必须制止你的对手，阻止他这场疯狂屠杀，外界人！否则，愿伊莎的眼泪在上，他的臣民必将遭受报应！”
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"

traits.locale_text: “愿阿苏焉保佑他的孩子们……我们必须制止你的对手，阻止他这场疯狂屠杀，外界人！否则，愿伊莎的眼泪在上，他的臣民必将遭受报应！”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Möge Asuryan seine Kinder schützen ... Wir müssen den Wahnsinn Eures stellaren Rivalen aufhalten, Elantach! Ansonsten, bei Ishas Tränen, werden seine Untertanen der Vergeltung nicht entkommen!"
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"

traits.locale_text: "Möge Asuryan seine Kinder schützen ... Wir müssen den Wahnsinn Eures stellaren Rivalen aufhalten, Elantach! Ansonsten, bei Ishas Tränen, werden seine Untertanen der Vergeltung nicht entkommen!"
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Que Asuryan proteja a sus hijos... ¡Debemos detener a tu rival estelar, elantach! Si no lo hacemos, por las lágrimas de Isha, ¡sus súbditos tendrán su merecido!»
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"

traits.locale_text: «Que Asuryan proteja a sus hijos... ¡Debemos detener a tu rival estelar, elantach! Si no lo hacemos, por las lágrimas de Isha, ¡sus súbditos tendrán su merecido!»
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「アシュリアンの御子にご加護を…我々は、あなたの星のライバルの狂乱を止めなければならない、エランタ！さもなければ、イシャの涙にかけて、その部下たちは報復を逃れられない！」
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリアンの御子にご加護を…我々は、あなたの星のライバルの狂乱を止めなければならない、エランタ！さもなければ、イシャの涙にかけて、その部下たちは報復を逃れられない！」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Asuryan, evlatlarını korusun... Elantach, ulvi hasmının bu gözü dönmüşlüğüne bir son vermemiz gerek! Yoksa İşa'nın gözünün yaşına yemin olsun, tebaası intikamdan kaçamayacak!"
languages.original_text: "May Asuryan protect his children... We must halt the frenzy of your stellar rival, elantach! Or else, by Isha's tears, his subjects will not escape retribution!"
